recipe.name: Snow on the Mountain
recipe.notes: After putting in a great number of entries I can say with a certainty that this is the finest name I ever have come across.
recipe.preparation: Dissolve gelatin and sugar in 1/2 cup boiling water.  Let cool + add 1 cup orange juice.  Refrigerate + when congealed, whip thoroughly.  Fold in 1/2 pt heavy cream, whipped stiff.  Fold in 1 sm can of crushed pineapple, well drained.  Add cubed cake.  Pour into spring-form pan + chill overnight.  Before serving, spread tops + sides with 1/2 pt whipped cream.  Sprinkle with coconut.
